website_summaries.verdict: Creates subtle waves with a nice scent without costing a lot of money.
pros: Enhances curls for curly or wavy hair
For straight hair, it's recommended to blow dry soft waves and then spray to hold and enhance
cons: The waves the spray creates for straight hair are pretty subtle

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My hair is fine and straight, but I do have a smidge of a wave to it when it's wet. And I do mean a smidge. I use Bumble and Bumble's sea salt spray regularly and with a little scrunching, I get pretty decent beachy waves without much work. However, B&B is crazy expensive. I figured this might be a decent alternative. I was wrong. It does nothing. It smells great, but I simply cannot get it to give me any kind of wave. I tried the whole twisting thing as suggested and still nothing. It makes my hair look dirty and stringy and just gross. I really wanted it to work for me, but it just didn't. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Just my 2 cents
customer_reviews.text: I just recently cut my hair short and I have natural beachy wavy hair. When I cut it I lost some of the body so I wanted to have a wave helper. It didn't work too well but I think that's because my hair is a little too short. I think it would work better on a little longer than shoulder length or just a tad shorter. My hair is like a long bob. Just be aware that it's not that the product doesn't work, it's that you have to have enough length and use it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Brick James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beachy waves
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked the beachy look but have never been able to find a sea salt spray that I really liked. This one is perfect! It makes my hair nice and wavy without making it feel sticky or stiff. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SarahTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff it smells so good and gives my slightly wavy hair more wave and curl without stiffness. My Wal-Mart or CVS doesn't carry this product anymore
customer_reviews.author: jones

customer_reviews.title: adds some body to fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I am probably using a little differently. using more as a casual hold to add a little body. works fine for that. Applied when hair is damp.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Stiff
customer_reviews.text: Makes hair feel stiff and crunchy v be achy waves
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have wavey hair that turns to frizz with no product. This spray leaves my hair soft with beachy/messy waves and isn't sticky or crunchy like mousse or hair spray. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Allenfarm

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I sue this with the perfectly undone wave foam. This helps to create more waves and leaves your hair looking healthy and natural.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Worked the same as every other beachy wave spray, ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked the same as every other beachy wave spray, minimal wave but enough to get away with air drying your hair. I have yet to find that unicorn product that does what the real beach does :(
customer_reviews.author: Kim J

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: My hair has changed texture as I have gotten older, more waves and some frizz. This adds softness to the curl and lessens the frizz. For the price, just go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Sedona

customer_reviews.title: Just use salt water.
customer_reviews.text: Technically works, about as well as salt water. Smells good, but kind of not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: nonsound

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray!!!!!!!! It doesn’t make my hair stiff
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shape
customer_reviews.text: This is so fabulous! My hair isnt crunchy and my curls have great shape
customer_reviews.author: Amy Foutch

customer_reviews.title: I have fine, wavy hair and follow a modified curly girl ...
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, wavy hair and follow a modified curly girl routine. Unfortunately this didn't do much for me and left me more tangly than anything, but I know plenty of women that swear by it. Curlies know you have to experiment to find the right products!
customer_reviews.author: Carly T.

customer_reviews.title: It's not bad, but it's not great.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is good. I'm about halfway through the the bottle and I use it everyday (it's been a few weeks and my hair goes down to my nose). I usually apply coconut oil before I deliberately spray this product, and, I must say, it doesn't do much (I let my hair to dry on its own, so maybe a hair dryer can make a difference). Whether it meets your expectations is really up to your own judgement. My hair naturally has waves here and there, but I wouldn't say this product enchances them; it merely makes them softer and smell better.
customer_reviews.author: Sorryforgotaboutdre

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been discontinued by Tresemme so Amazon helped a sister out. Good price! Authentic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Hair
customer_reviews.text: Smells awesome, did not work on my straight thick hair
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for that wavy seaspray look that's so in ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for that wavy seaspray look that's so in right now. My hair is really long so it doesn't work as well for it as it would with shorter hair. Still an awesome product that I would recommend for that fun, messy look!
customer_reviews.author: Patty H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like how this felt on my hair. I’m sticking with a brand I already know and like.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Not a pure sea salt spray
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to add some texture to my hair, so was looking for a sea salt water. This is not just a sea salt water, it is a spray with some sticky product and sweet smell. I don't like how it smells, also it is not what I thought it was. Think twice before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work - Can't return
customer_reviews.text: The product does not work at all and it smells horrible. Worst of all, it isn't even eligible to return. Many other better products out there, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: CORY JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hair product Ive tried. Doesn't leave it stiff, just enough protection to hold curls
customer_reviews.author: Rsportsman

customer_reviews.title: am pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: it does what it says, am pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend only because I found the fragrance to be too strong. I'm told this product was discontinued several years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just spray a little after blowdry to look a little fly 😅
customer_reviews.author: Adam591

customer_reviews.title: Best product out there
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best product for this value!! I cannot express enough the way it feels, not to sticky , snaps back in my curl!! LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different and nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. Very light and Most Importantly.... doesn't tangle my hair!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: smells great and gives a lot of volume and texture
customer_reviews.author: Megan Gaw

customer_reviews.title: Best sea salt spray
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sea salt spray I’ll use. It holds my curl without frizz and without making my hair crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: it leaves the hair tacky enough so you can scrunch it or leave messy in a cool beach breeze way
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in a recent magazine and thought I'd try it. Once sprayed on semi-dry hair, it leaves the hair tacky enough so you can scrunch it or leave messy in a cool beach breeze way.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: Not My Favorite Spray
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair feel dirty and matted, not much different than using cheap grade hair spray. Used it twice then gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.sipich

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it and will continue to buy it monthly as I have about a year now
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray for my wavy hair It doesn’t make it hard like mouse and it feels natural but with control
customer_reviews.author: MSerna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. My hair doesn’t dry wavy like it does with other similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Great Volume for long straight hair!
customer_reviews.text: This works and for the price you can't beat it. I have fine long hair and this product gives my hair more volume and easy to style.
customer_reviews.author: JR Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for "beachy waves". It didn't make my hair stiff or oily at all.
customer_reviews.author: shrinktogo

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product, but they fell short. I rarely ever use a straightener or curling iron on my hair and prefer to wear it natural to avoid damage. I bought this in hopes that it might give my hair a little extra volume and scrunch to make it look better. I was wrong. It has left my hair looking terrible and extremely frizzy. I would rather use nothing at all than this. The only upside was that it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Endicott

customer_reviews.title: So bad that I can't return it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does not work on my long n thick wavy hair. I almost used half of the bottle in my first use and could hardly find it working. So bad that I can't return it. If your hair is anything like mine then don't buy it !
customer_reviews.author: Sahi

customer_reviews.title: Just ok- much better products on the market
customer_reviews.text: After reading tons of reviews on amazon to find a beach wave scrunch spray I purchased this and one other brands product ( sexy hair soy renewal beach spray). The perfectly undone sea salt spray was not my favorite and just worked ok. It didn't have as much hold for my curls and I didn't care for the smell. The other product worked much better and smelled so much better. I wouldn't recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This makes my hair crispy, so I'm not fond of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fine hair is naturally wavy
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I notice much of a difference when I use this spray. My fine hair is naturally wavy, but due to the Texas humidity it gets frizzy. I was hoping this spray would calm the frizz without weighing my hair down, but I think it added too much weight. Might work better for people with thicker hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee M

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have straight hair and often have trouble getting it to do much else. Following the instructions worked well, but I also use this product when I was my hair in the evening, then braid it, and when it is dry in the morning take out the braid for a wavy effect. I have done that for years, but when I started using this product I got so many compliments! I thought it was interesting since these people have seen me do this to my hair before. But I think this product not only helped to keep the waves all day long but not frizzy or just messy looking. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Spray works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have straight hair that takes me too long to dry when I'm running behind. I use this spray as well as some conocunt beach spray to create a beach wave affect. Quick cheap and simple when in a rush. Spray works great!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Caused massive rash
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. It gave my daughter a terrible rash on her neck and shoulders. We will never use it again! Oh, and it did NOT hold her waves.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ablassmeir

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is usually too silky to hold a barrette or clip for very long, but this salt-spray gives just enough grip to make combs and clips stay in for hours and sometimes all day. It is not nearly as heavy as a swim in the sea, in fact, you scarcely no it's there. The only time I notice a difference is when I forget to spray it on! Recommended to try for medium fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyShopper

customer_reviews.title: I have finally found the perfect product to give my pixie texture and keep it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found the perfect product to give my pixie texture and keep it from going "Mom" without feeling like a helmet or my hair is dirty, like waxes and sculpting creams leave it. A few spritzes of this worked through my hair and some gentle finger-tousling while blow drying, and my pixie is perfect all day long. Just the right amount of texture and hold. Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: This makes my hair look greasy even if I only spray a little. When I spray it leaves gunk wherever I spray it. It doesn't even make my hair wavy more like liquid mousse. I am not happy. The only reason I didn't give less stars than 3 is because I am going to try it on wet hair and update my review. I have only used it on dry and damp hair. I am hoping it works for wet hair but I doubt it since it didn't work for dry and damp hair. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone. I will update my review later on.
customer_reviews.author: Laken

customer_reviews.title: Talk about ITCHING!
customer_reviews.text: So I loved the way this worked. I would use this to add texture on an off day that I didn’t wash my hair. I’d do a braid or fishtail and pin, and leave the ends down, it was fabulous but my scalp started itching terribly. Let me tell you-I thought I had lice. I took a break from using this for a few weeks and then the last two days I went back to it and I was right. And I’m relieved I don’t actually have lice. The bottle is in the garbage :(
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey Hickman

customer_reviews.title: No crunch, no stickiness, no waves.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do anything for my mostly straight hair. So my hair is mostly straight and just frizzy with humidity. When I use mousse to scrunch it up, I get beautiful beachy waves but they are crunchy. I was hoping for non crunchy waves with this product but it doesn't even hold curling iron waves. At all. It holds nothing. Nothing. It might be due to the humidity here in Austin.
customer_reviews.author: GMS

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i really like this product for soft waves and not like some products used to scrunch slightly curly hair that make your hair appear wet. this product is no longer available in Canada so i was thrilled to see it offered on amazon.com and shipped to Canada. my only complaint is the price. i feel that its too expensive for a non salon product that used to be available in the local grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Easy styling
customer_reviews.text: I have a small wave in my hair and this makes it more curly. On days when I don’t want to blow dry, I just spray, scrunch and done! I have super oily hair and helps hold down the oil too. I can go an extra day until I have to wash my hair. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Opozz

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, doesn't feel sticky or stiff, but not quite as much hold and texture as other beach sprays I've tried like Healthy Sexy Hair's beach spray. Still good and feels softer than that one, if you like soft better than texture.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Easy beach waves
customer_reviews.text: My hair was stick straight until after my second baby and then all the sudden it was a half wavy, half curly wild mess. I love to use this before work because it’s quick and easy. I’m on my third or fourth bottle now and will continue to order.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Wenning

customer_reviews.title: Gives you a fun beach bounce Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Gives you a fun beach bounce Cons: I don't know if it's because I have thick hair or because I'm a noob, but it always looks a little frizzy to me. Hence the 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Nice beach waves!
customer_reviews.text: Makes great "beach waves" without using too much product. I use it almost daily. Not sticky, and is lightweight. It gets hard to spray out the last little bit from the bottle though so I usually transfer it to the next bottle towards the end.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Smells and Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the smell is amazing. I wish they made a perfume with this luscious scent. The product works better than any other of its kind. I use it on wet/damp hair and it gives a really nice curl.
customer_reviews.author: S. F

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Unfortunately, my local store doesn’t always keep it stocked. This product really helps me keep my wild hair in check! I can spritz, scrunch, & go! Wavey, loose curls without the frizz!
customer_reviews.author: BentPenny

customer_reviews.title: I have naturally thick, straight hair. I use ...
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally thick, straight hair. I use this on wet hair and braid my hair. Once the hair dries completely, I do have a tighter curl than without using it.
customer_reviews.author: S.U.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use it year round to help my wavy hair look great! It smells really good too!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Beachy waves?
customer_reviews.text: My hair is so sticky after using this. The texture is not for my hair. I have thick long hair and it just left it stiff and chunky.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnywabbit

customer_reviews.title: Beachy hair
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works! I have board straight hair and I figured this would just be another product that I would buy and use a couple times to no avail. I was disappointed to see that I had to twist my hair while blow drying it since I had already tried that technique and it did not work on my hair. Much to my surprise, I sprayed my hair, followed the directions on the bottle, and it worked! I have received lots of compliments - looks so cute and beachy - exactly the look I was going for!
customer_reviews.author: T. Isom

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff. Makes awesome beachy waves that stay
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love this stuff. Makes our hair have great beachy waves. Will definitely buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Tripletmom26

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It gives my hair a lot of volume
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good but I wish the spray was a little better
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, but the spray nozzle is a little messed up with this particular bottle. It's probably fine with most other bottles.
customer_reviews.author: GMoore

customer_reviews.title: Great and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this smells and it works much better than more expensive sprays I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Domenica Favero-Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is light and easy to use. Keep my hair easy to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Jnet

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it just isn't for me.
customer_reviews.text: The smell wasn't awful, but it wasn't great either. It wasn't a summer-y smell you'd expect with the smell of the ocean in your hair. I didn't like how it seemed to need a lot to get the affect I was expecting. Maybe it just isn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: likes this best, as an unobtrusive hair mist
customer_reviews.text: Husband, after trying others more expensive, likes this best, as an unobtrusive hair mist.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Great for all hair types.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully on my naturally straight hair. Love the body and texture this product offers!
customer_reviews.author: OverItTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Salon quality, drugstore price
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as the high priced salon products.
customer_reviews.author: BritLit

customer_reviews.title: Good for medium length men’s hair
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and makes my hair look more thick and full
customer_reviews.author: James H

customer_reviews.title: Great waves!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great I love the waves I got from it! Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad salt spray
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent salt spray. It has a pretty good smell but I find that it can leave my hair a little too hard, like i've sprayed with too much hairspray.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: works well on my semi wavy/curly hair. I get ...
customer_reviews.text: works well on my semi wavy/curly hair. I get tons of compliments when I wear it down and add this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N

customer_reviews.title: Beachy hair
customer_reviews.text: i use this every morning and its the best hair product i use to date. It does a good job of keeping my hair beachy
customer_reviews.author: Nick Z.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like grandma potpourri and doesn't work as well as Surf Spray
customer_reviews.text: Smells like grandma potpourri and doesn't work as well as Surf Spray
customer_reviews.author: C. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works really well after I curl my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works really well after I curl my hair with a wand, makes awesome beach waves. I have naturally curly hair and I find that it's not great if you just want to spray and go.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy use, beautiful results
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice sea salt spray. I first found this product in a store but after falling in love couldn't find it anywhere locally. Luckily Amazon offered it still and even at a cheaper price than found in my area! This gives such nice textured waves so easily. I have a slight wave to my hair naturally but I don't have much texture. All I did was brush my hair after washing, spray, scrunch, and let it air dry. Perfect for busy moms or college students (I'm both so double bonus!!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Smells fine. Not a fan though as it doesn't work for my fine and somewhat naturally wavy hair. It didn't make a difference using the techniques on bottle. When left to dry naturally my hair gets some loose spirals around my face and the rest is somewhat wavy; there were no additional/defined waves/curls using this product.
customer_reviews.author: kidsarethebest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of my hair after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: STICKY, NO MOVEMENT.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an option for the John Frieda gel, Chunky, that was taken off the market. But this is nothing to compare to. The one I was looking for gives you beach waves. Thought the mist will be better that the foam but same thing, just leaves your hair sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: All the waves with no crunch!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is my go-to for making it look like I actually made some effort to manage my mop in the morning. Perfect for making my slightly wavy hair beach wave hair without making it all stiff and crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell, but it doesn't give me the volume and fresh ocean look that most sea salt sprays have. I wouldn't recommend but I will use it since I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Found online!
customer_reviews.text: I knew how much I liked it, but couldn't find it at Wal-Mart anymore. It works well for fine, thin hair!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not healthy
customer_reviews.text: This gave me a headache when I put it on. In TRESemmé's defense, other sea salt hair sprays I tried did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

product_meta.title: TRESemmé PERFECTLY (UN)DONE Sea Salt Spray 6.76 oz
product_meta.description: Get an effortlessly sexy, undone beach look all year long - no matter when and where. This non-sticky formula, infused with Sea Kelp Extract, helps you create a sexy, full-bodied, tousled style in every strand. Featherlight polymers give you a natural-looking, sexy style without salty stiffness
feature_bullets: Spray helps infuse hair with texture for natural looking waves all over
Perfect for a festival, beach day or anytime you want to achieve a loose, textured style
